title: Comment on Spoon premiere “Hot Thoughts”, the sexy title track to their new album — listen by Download Spoon - Hot Thoughts [320 + iTunes]
text:
Reddit 
Grab your fork and knife and get ready to cut into some new Spoon . 
(Read: The 50 Most Anticipated Albums of 2017 ) 
As expected, it’s a delightful chunk of indie rock, topped with a dollop of classical charm, one that dances rather nicely with the hip-swinging guitars. Sorry Adam Levine, but this one moves like Jagger. Stream above. 
Hot Thoughts hits stores March 17th via Matador. Update: Spoon have confirmed a three-night residency in their hometown of Austin, Texas during the week of SXSW . Taking place March 14th, 15th, and 16th at The Main, each night will feature a unique lineup curated by the band.
